actions.name: Vine
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage and 5 (2d4) poison and the target must make DC 14 Con save or be poisoned for 1 min. If the target is a creature it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained and must succeed on a new save each round it remains grappled or take another 5 (2d4) poison. The asp vine can grapple up to four targets at a time though it can still make vine attacks vs. other targets even if it has four grappled opponents.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from normal cluster of vines.
